text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump On 1/22/2020 @POTUS said his Admin had the #coronavirus totally under control.
https://t.co/1lS9Y9uOGy
His LIE only delayed US response to the #CoronavirusOutbreak 
He's still holding back tests and retaining ppl on a cruise ship to keep the outbreak no. low - for Re-Election.
